recipes.title: MONTADITO DE AGUACATE Y HUEVO
recipes.subtitle: Avocado Egg Mini Toast
recipes.benefits: Avocado = healthy fats (sustained energy 3-4h!), egg = protein + B12 (brain fog GONE!), complex carbs = serotonin boost, SMALL PORTION = stable blood sugar (no crash!), arugula = iron (oxygen transport!).
recipes.story: Montadito = classic tapas bar mini! Eat standing at the bar counter in M치laga, small bite = big energy, continue hopping!
steps: Toast the mini bread
Mash avocado with olive oil and salt
Boil quail egg for 3 min, peel, cut in half
Spread toast with avocado, place egg on top
Sprinkle with piment칩n, Maldon salt, arugula
Eat in 2 bites - tapas style!

recipes.title: D츼TILES CON ALMENDRAS Y CHOCOLATE
recipes.subtitle: Date Almond Chocolate Bites
recipes.description: Power Bites for instant energy without caffeine
recipes.benefits: Dates = natural glucose + fiber (quick energy NO spike!), almonds = magnesium + B vitamins (anti-fatigue!), dark chocolate = theobromine (gentle stimulant, NOT caffeine!) + flavonoids (blood flow to brain!), cinnamon = blood sugar control.
recipes.story: D치tiles = tapas classic in every Spanish bar! Pop 2-3 between drinks (no alcohol for you!), keep moving, pure energ칤a! Perfect 4 pm merienda!
steps: If dates have pits, make a slit and remove
Place one almond inside each date
Melt chocolate (microwave 30 sec intervals)
Dip half of each date in chocolate
Place on parchment paper, sprinkle with salt and cinnamon
Cool in fridge for 10 min
Eat 2-3 as tapas = instant boost!

recipes.title: BOQUERONES EN VINAGRE CON LIM칍N
recipes.subtitle: Marinated Anchovies with Lemon
recipes.description: Omega-3 Shot for brain energy and focus
recipes.warning: High histamine - avoid on histamine days!
recipes.benefits: Boquerones = OMEGA-3 BOMB (brain fuel + blood flow!), B12 = anti-fatigue vitamin (energy production!), protein = sustained power, garlic = circulation (oxygen!), vinegar = stabilizes blood sugar post-meal.
recipes.story: Boquerones = MUST in every tapas bar in M치laga! Appetizer #1 during tapeo! Quick, cold, refreshing, keep hopping to next bar!
ingredients: 150g boquerones en vinagre (marinated anchovies from Mercadona)
steps: Drain boquerones from vinegar
Arrange on small tapas plate
Add garlic slices, drizzle with olive oil and lemon
Sprinkle with parsley and chili
Let sit for 5 min (flavors meld!)
Eat with fork + dip bread in the oil

recipes.title: SALMON AVOCADO ROLL
recipes.subtitle: Libido-Boost Sushi
recipes.benefits: Salmon = omega-3 + vitamin D (hormone precursor!), avocado = healthy fats (sensual energy!), wasabi = circulation boost, ginger = anti-inflammatory. Japanese precision = mindfulness in eating.
recipes.story: The tenderness of Japanese precision. Each roll crafted with intention. Eating becomes meditation. Energy flows like a calm river.
steps: Cook sushi rice, mix with rice vinegar
Slice salmon and avocado into thin strips
Place nori sheet on bamboo mat
Spread rice thinly on nori
Arrange salmon and avocado in center
Roll tightly using mat
Cut into 8 pieces with wet knife
Serve with wasabi, ginger, soy sauce

recipes.title: SWEET POTATO NACHOS
recipes.subtitle: American Diner Comfort
recipes.benefits: Sweet potato = complex carbs + beta-carotene (mood stabilizer!), black beans = fiber + protein (satiety!), avocado = healthy fats, spices = anti-inflammatory. All the comfort without the guilt.
recipes.story: Friday night movie vibes. American diner comfort meets hormonal intelligence. Because self-care sometimes looks like nachos.
steps: Preheat oven to 200춿C (400춿F)
Toss sweet potato slices with olive oil
Bake for 25-30 min until crisp
Heat black beans with cumin and paprika
Arrange chips on plate, top with beans
Add avocado, dollop of Greek yogurt
Drizzle with lime juice, sprinkle cilantro
